body: This group of four brightly colored sticks is adorned with colorful streamers that can be juggled and manipulated to create displays and patterns. Halflings use them to even greater effect, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on Perform (comedy) checks.
name: Halfling Jugglesticks
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Equipment/Halfling Jugglesticks
